data.name: Kalen Chock Presents: 3D Sketching
data.detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


#label_about_the_series

Sometimes coming up with ideas can be a little hard . Here we explore how we can use 3D packages to block out rough scenes in which we paint over them. You only need a basic understanding of 3D to follow along for this one . In this Tutorial you will get- -2 Hour HD Video with commentary -PSD / JPEG Files -Maya/OBJ Files -Bonus Sped Up Process Painting ( no audio )
data.about_the_game:
Sometimes coming up with ideas can be a little hard . Here we explore how we can use 3D packages to block out rough scenes in which we paint over them.
You only need a basic understanding of 3D to follow along for this one .


In this Tutorial you will get-

-2 Hour HD Video with commentary
-PSD / JPEG Files
-Maya/OBJ Files
-Bonus Sped Up Process Painting ( no audio )
data.short_description: In this tutorial we will explore how to use 3D packages to block out scenes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.
